member.returns: The current value of the specified property.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControlContent.CreateFromXaml(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Silverlight object from its markup form.
member.param: The XAML markup representing the object.
member.returns: The object deserialized from the markup.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControlContent.CreateFromXaml(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a Silverlight object from its markup form and allows creating a new name scope for the elements.
member.param: The XAML markup representing the object.
Whether to create a new namescope for the elements.
member.returns: The object deserialized from the markup.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControlContent.CreateFromXamlDownloader(System.Silverlight.Downloader)
member.summary: Creates a Silverlight object from its markup form that has been downloaded using a Downloader object.
member.param: The downloaded XAML markup representing the object.
member.returns: The object deserialized from the markup.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControlContent.CreateFromXamlDownloader(System.Silverlight.Downloader,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Silverlight object from its markup form that has been downloaded using a Downloader object.
member.param: The downloaded XAML markup representing the object.
The name of the entry within the downloaded content (when the content is a zip file).
member.returns: The object deserialized from the markup.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControlContent.FindName(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a named Silverlight object defined in the XAML content being hosted by this control instance.
member.param: The name assigned to the object.
member.returns: The object if it is present in the XAML; null otherwise.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters
member.summary: Represents a set of parameters and related information needed to instantiate and add Silverlight controls into the page. Note that each instance of this object should be used to create only one Silverlight control, i.e. it may not be reused to create multiple Silverlight control instances.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.alternateContent
member.summary: The alternate content that is used instead of the install prompt if the Silverlight control is not installed.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.background
member.summary: An optional background color of the Silverlight control. Colors may be specified by name or using an #AARRGGBB color notation.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.className
member.summary: An optional CSS class name associated with the Silverlight control.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.errorCallback
member.summary: An optional custom error handler for handling plugin errors.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.id
member.summary: An optional ID for the Silverlight control.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.initParams
member.summary: A JSON-encoded set of name/value pairs that can be used to set parameter values for use by managed code running within a Silverlight control.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.installPromptImage
member.summary: A custom install prompt image to be used if Silverlight is not installed. The install prompt is created using an install prompt image that links to the Silverlight install site or installer.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.installInNewWindow
member.summary: Whether the navigation to the installation page happens in a new window.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.maxFrameRate
member.summary: An optional maximum frame rate that specifies how often (per second) the Silverlight control refreshes itself.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.parentElement
member.summary: The DOM element in the page whose contents will be replaced with the Silverlight control that is instantiated.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.progressCallback
member.summary: An optional source download progress handler. This can be used to update the splash screen as the actual source downloads.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.source
member.summary: The source to be loaded into the Silverlight control.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.splashScreenSource
member.summary: An optional URL to a XAML file to be used to contain splash-screen UI. This property is only supported with version 2.0 and greater.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.startupArguments
member.summary: A set of name/value pairs to pass into the Silverlight control.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.style
member.summary: An optional inline style for the control to specifying CSS attributes (such as width, height etc). This is especially useful if a CSS className cannot be used.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.suppressInstallPrompt
member.summary: Allows suppressing the install prompt creation even if Silverlight is not installed. The default value is false;

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.version
member.summary: The minimum version of the Silverlight to be used. This defaults to 1.0.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.windowless
member.summary: Whether the control is windowless in the HTML page, i.e. it can participate in z-index, or semi-transparent rendering with respect to the HTML content on the page. This defaults to false.

member.name: F:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.xaml
member.summary: An optionally specified XAML markup to be loaded instead of source.

member.name: P:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Allows the ability to specify and retrieve additional custom parameters that should be set on the Silverlight control.
member.param: The name of the custom parameter.
member.returns: The value of the custom parameter.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControl
member.summary: Represents an instance of the Silverlight activex control or plugin within the HTML document.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControl.CreateObject(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an object that offers services exposed by the this control.
member.param: The type of the object.

member.name: P:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControl.IsLoaded
member.summary: Indicates whether this control has loaded its XAML content.

member.summary: Represents a text Silverlight element within the XAML content.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.Canvas
member.summary: Represents a canvas Silverlight element within the XAML content.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.SolidColorBrush
member.summary: Represents a Brush used to fill elements with a single color.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.GradientBrush
member.summary: Represents a Brush used to fill elements with a gradient defined by a set of colors.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.TriggerCollection
member.summary: Represents a set of individual triggers.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.PathSegmentCollection
member.summary: Represents a set of individual PathSegment instances.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.Path
member.summary: Represents an path Silverlight element within the XAML content.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.ResourceCollection
member.summary: Represents a set of resources.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.Ink.StylusPointCollection
member.summary: Represents a set of individual stylus points.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin
member.summary: ControlFactory provides the ability to instantiate and add Silverlight controls into the page. In addition, this helper class also provides the ability to detect if the Silverlight control has been installed on the user's machine, and whether it is supported in the current browser.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.CreateInstallPrompt(System.DHTML.DOMElement,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Silverlight install prompt within the specified parent element, using the default install prompt image.
member.param: The parent HTML element to contain the prompt.
The minimum version of the Silverlight control desired.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.CreateInstallPrompt(System.DHTML.DOMElement,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Silverlight install prompt within the specified parent element using the specified image.
member.param: The parent HTML element to contain the prompt.
The minimum version of the Silverlight control desired.
The URL of the image to use as the prompt.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.CreateInstallPrompt(System.DHTML.DOMElement,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a Silverlight install prompt within the specified parent element using the specified image.
member.param: The parent HTML element to contain the prompt.
The minimum version of the Silverlight control desired.
The URL of the image to use as the prompt.
Whether the navigation to the install page happens in a new window.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.CreateInstance(System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the Silverlight control.
member.param: A set of parameters describing the control to be created.
member.returns: A reference to the newly created Silverlight control.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.CreateInstance(System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters,System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginLoadCallback)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the Silverlight control, and calls the specified callback when the specified source has been loaded into the control.
member.param: A set of parameters describing the control to be created.
A callback that is invoked once the control has been loaded.
member.returns: A reference to the newly created Silverlight control.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.CreateInstance(System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginParameters,System.Silverlight.SilverlightPluginLoadCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the Silverlight control, and calls the specified callback when the specified source has been loaded into the control along with the specified context object.
member.param: A set of parameters describing the control to be created.
A callback that is invoked once the control has been loaded.
A context object that is passed in into the load callback method.
member.returns: A reference to the newly created Silverlight control.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.CreateParams(System.String,System.DHTML.DOMElement)
member.summary: Creates an instance of ControlParameters with the required source and parent element properties.
member.param: The source to be loaded into the Silverlight control.
The DOM element that should contain the newly instantiated Silverlight control.
member.returns: A newly created parameters that can be further customized with optional properties.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.CreateParams(System.String,System.DHTML.DOMElement,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of ControlParameters with the required source and parent element properties.
member.param: The source to be loaded into the Silverlight control.
The DOM element that should contain the newly instantiated Silverlight control.
The ID of the newly instantiated Silverlight control.
The CSS class name applied to the Silverlight control.
member.returns: A newly created parameters that can be further customized with optional properties.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.IsInstalled
member.summary: Checks if the Silverlight control is installed on the user's machine.
member.returns: true if the control is installed, and false otherwise.

member.name: M:System.Silverlight.SilverlightPlugin.IsInstalled(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a version of the Silverlight control greater than or equal to the specified version is installed on the user's machine.
member.param: The minimum version to check for.
member.returns: true if the control is installed, and false otherwise.

member.name: P:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControlSettings.Background
member.summary: The background color of this control to be used for blending in windowless mode.

member.name: P:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControlSettings.EnableFrameRateCounter
member.summary: Indicates whether to display information about the current frame rate in the status bar.

member.name: P:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControlSettings.EnableRedrawRegions
member.summary: Indicates whether to indicate areas of this control being redrawn in single frame.

member.name: P:System.Silverlight.SilverlightControlSettings.MaxFrameRate
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of frames to render per second.

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.LinearGradientBrush

member.name: T:System.Silverlight.Presentation.RadialGradientBrush
member.summary: Represents a Brush used to fill elements with a gradient defined by a set of colors from a focus point to a specified radius.
